description: Save time and money with our set of 200 balloon-sealing clips that are suitable for helium or foil balloons. Once inflated, wrap the neck of the balloon around the plastic clip to conveniently secure it into place. Use the clips with string to tie the balloons onto chairs or railings throughout your event, or tie them to balloon weights to line pathways and hallways. Spend less time decorating and more time enjoying the party with your family and friends!
